description: Capture the planting process for seedlings or saplings, including the location, date, and any other relevant details. Each planting action should be documented separately.

media.title: Photograph the Plot
media.description: Please take a photo of the location where you will be planting Seedlings or Saplings

details.title: Input Planting Details
details.description: Please provide the following details about the planting process
details.feedbackPlaceholder: If you have any feedback or had any issues during the planting process, please provide details here

inputs.title: How many plants were planted?
inputs.placeholder: Enter the number of plants planted

review.title: Review Planting Details
review.description: Please review the details you have provided before submitting
